snippet: The English tenor Toby Spence, currently singing in Thomas Adès’s “Tempest” at the Met, gave his first New York recital at the Frick Collection on Sunday.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by British tenor Toby Spence at the Frick Collection.
lead_paragraph: The English tenor Toby Spence, currently singing in Thomas Adès’s “Tempest” at the Met, gave his first New York recital at the Frick Collection on Sunday.

headline.seo: Toby Spence Sings Beethoven and Mahler at the Frick
headline.main: Vocal Selections Frick Would Have Recognized
headline.print_headline: Vocal Selections Frick Would Have Recognized
